amendment.description: An amendment to request that the Secretary of the Interior add the Lumberjack Bowl to the National Register of Historc Places.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. McClintock.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
